text:
I am generating report with table contents in navy color. As long as the table 
fits one page things are fine. As soon as the table overflows to next page the 
color rendered becomes black. I tried giving color to <fo:table>, <fo:block>, 
<fo:inline>, <fo:table-cell> but all give same result.

I then changed color attribute of first cell block of overflown table data to 
different color and voila the color change took effect!! it was surprising.But 
this is not what I want. Is this a bug.

Maybe other attributes also donot work on overflown data?

Can you look into this OR help me!! 

Raju Dave
iORMYX GmbH
creator: rbdave@rediffmail.com
j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
I cannot reproduce the problem with 0.20.3. I'm not sure I really understand
it. Setting a color porperty on fo:table and alternatively on each cell
behaves as expected.
A testcase would have helped.

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text: Seems that this was actually a duplicate of Bug 1972.
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
